long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Magic Eden Sniper Solana

- Checks the floor price of the collection and calculates the value, including commissions, gas fee, contract address, etc.
- It detects and sends a request first for buying NFTs much lower than the floor price (price difference is set by the user)
- Supports several wallets
- Sends floor price warnings
- Supports a fixed buy price function - buys all NFTs falling into a fixed price range when the floor price goes down.
- It's desirable to have also a function of dynamic buy price - it floats depending on the current floor price and volume
- Keeps track of whale wallets activity 
- Tracks several different collections at once
- Capable of notifying about changes in floor price in real time
